column1: On XX/XX/2019 I filed a Dispute with Equifax to which they conducted " an investigation '' which did not consist of anything other than them contacting the creditor and getting information written on a screen whether that information was false or not Equifax did not care. Additional Equifax refused to accept any of the documents that I sent in as proof to include the letter from the creditor ( with the header and contact info ) that stated the information on my account was inaccurate as reported. On XX/XX/2019 I filed an additional dispute containing the same information as the original information to which was found in my favor to what Equifax has informed me of. This information was sent by Equifax to someone else 's email address other than mine. I called Equifax to get them to send the information to the correct email address. On XX/XX/2019 another dispute ( XXXX ) was created to send the information to my email address. This information was sent once again to the wrong email address. On XX/XX/2019 I called Equifax once again and the rep agreed to send a copy of the dispute to the correct email address, however, hung up on me. I have called back to ensure this was taken care of multiple times on XX/XX/2019 and spent over 3 hours on the phone without prevailing and was transferred over 10 times

XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXXXXXX XXXX  XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX, FL XXXX Account # XXXX XXXX To Whom It May Concern : Thank you for taking the time to read this letter. Im writing this letter because I noticed that my credit report contains late payments reported on ( XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX for my SELF/LEAD BANK Account, I want you to know that I understand my financial obligations, and if it werent for the pandemic of covid-19 and the loss of my grandmother through the virus, Id have an excellent repayment record. I made a mistake in falling behind, but before then, Ive had a spotless record of on-time payments. Im planning to apply for a mortgage, and its come to my attention that the missed payment on my record could hurt my ability to qualify. I truly believe that it doesnt reflect my creditworthiness and commitment to repaying my debts. It would help me immensely if you could give me a second chance and make a goodwill adjustment to remove the late payments.  Thank you for your consideration, and I hope youll approve my request.  Best, XXXX XXXX XXXX

In accordance with the Fair Credit Reporting act. The list of accounts below has violated my federally protected consumer rights to privacy and confidentiality under 15 USC 1681.   XXXX XXXX # XXXX, XXXX XXXX XXXX  # XXXX, XXXX # XXXX, XXXX XXXX # XXXX, XXXX  XXXX XXXX # XXXX, XXXX XXXX XXXX  # XXXX, XXXX XXXX XXXX  # XXXX, XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX has violated my rights.   15 U S.C 1681 section 602 A. States I have the right to privacy.  15 U.S.C 1681 section 604 A Section 2 : It also states a consumer reporting agency can not furnish a account without my written instructions.  15 U S.C 1681c. ( a ) ( 5 ) Section states no consumer reporting agency may make any consumer report containing any of the following items of information any other adverse items of information, other than records of convictions of crimes which antedates the report by more that seven years.  15 U.S.C 1681s-2 ( a ) ( 1 ) A person shall not furnish any consumer reporting agency if the person knows or has reasonable cause to believe that the information is inaccurate.

This is my another endeavor to tell 3 CREDIT BUREAUS that I am a victim of identity theft and to complain specific records in my document because of their wrongdoing. The records I am questioning connect with no exchanges acquiring any possession of goods, services or money that I have made or authorized. Assuming no one cares either way, block the noteworthy of any information in my credit record that came about due to an alleged fraud. Per Section 605b of the FCRA CREDIT BUREAUS are required by law to remove any ITEMS or information which is found to be opened due to identity theft. The following XXXX opened in XX/XX/XXXX and paid in full via debt collectors, several years ago, after the statute of limitation already allowed for this debt to be canceled, has all of the sudden been reported XX/XX/XXXX why now?  Ive been working hard to improve my credit score and now this appears out of the blue to damage it. Doesnt it seem very suspicious?  Thanks for your attention!  This has been paid in full at least 5-10 years ago, unknowingly after the statute of  limitations made it unnecessary, through a debt collector : XXXX XXXX Account Details Last Reported XX/XX/XXXX Creditor Name XXXX XXXX Account Type Credit Card Account Status Closed Opened Date XX/XX/XXXX Closed Date -- Limit {$4700.00} Term -- Monthly Payment {$5400.00} Responsibility Individual Account.  Balance {$5400.00} Highest Balance {$6900.00} Payment Status Collection/Charge-Off Worst Payment Status -- Date of Last Payment XX/XX/XXXX Amount Past Due {$5100.00} Times 30/60/90 Days Late 1/1/3 Remarks Charged off account Account closed by credit grantor

I received an alert that a credit inquiry was done on my credit through equifax mortgage services and I have not done any business with equifax or applied for any mortgages through equifax. I am not sure why they are assessing my credit but i did not give them permission to inquire of my credit for any reason and especially not for a mortgage. I havve never owned a home and have not applied for one through equifax. I didn't even know that equifax offered mortages. I have fraud alerts on my credit file with all 3 bureaus and it appears that equifax may be committing the fraud. their system is now even asking me questions about me having a mortgage when i try to verify to release the freeze on my credit file but i have never had a mortgage. It have issues verifying when equifax riggs up my credit file to keep me from utilizing it when i need to release the freeze from my file.

This is in regards to the Equifax breach in 2017, I am trying to freeze my XXXX year old 's credit. I can not get a copy of his free credit report online because he is under the age of XXXX. I can not file to freeze his credit with the three credit reporting agencies online. I have to obtain on these special documents ( my driver 's license, his birth certificate, my SSN card, copy of my birth certificate, ect ) and mail them into the credit reporting agencies. I do not feel comfortable making copies of all these private documents putting them in an envelope labeled to each specific credit reporting agency. What if someone opens this piece of mail with all my personal information? This is not my fault this has happened. This shouldn't be this hard to put a freeze on my child 's credit.

States I have the right to privacy. 15 U.S.C 1681 Section 604 A Section 2 : It also states a consumer reporting agency can not furnish a account without my written instructions 15 U.S.C 1681c. ( a ) ( 5 ) Section States : no consumer reporting agency may make any consumer report containing any of the following items of information Any other adverse item of information, other than records of convictions of crimes which antedates the report by more than seven years. 15 U.S.C. 1681s-2 ( A ) ( 1 ) A person shall not furnish any information relating to a consumer to any consumer reporting agency if the person knows or has reasonable cause to believe that the information is inaccurate. 15 U.S.C 1681 ( A ) ( 4 ) There is a need to insure that consumer reporting agencies exercise their grave responsibilities with fairness, impartiality, and a respect for the consumers right to privacy. 15 U.S. Code 1692b ( 5 ) - Acquisition of location information not use any language or symbol on any envelope or in the contents of any communication effected by the mails or telegram that indicates that the debt collector is in the debt collection business or that the communication relates to the collection of a debt ;

Nelnet was put on notice and provided an Affidavit of Truth, Identity Theft Affidavit, Loan Discharge : Forgery Application, and a police report regarding the alleged debt of Federal Student Loans as of XX/XX/2023. I have given Nelnet with 5 days to delete this fraudulent loan from my consumer report and they have yet to follow up nor did they remove the fraudulent. Now ( XXXX ) has informed me that it will take 6-8 weeks to remove an account that is not mine and has hindered my consumer file for years and I am not waiting 6-8 weeks for a removal when this has gone on for YEARS! UNACCEPTABLE! I have provided Nelnet with enough time to gather evident or any other documents necessary prior, this has caused defamation to my character and my consumer file. Exhibit A will provide proof of received document via XXXX. As well as Exhibit B - XXXX with Nelnet confirmed on XX/XX/2023 at that they have received the documents uploaded into their system.
